Reviews.name: Metroid Dread
Reviews.title: Dreadfully Epic
Reviews.reason: The best Metroidvania game to ever exist to date.

Reviews.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
Reviews.title: Life is A Series of Choices
Reviews.reason: Many games barely pluck the chords that this game strikes. Although I never shed a tear, this game very well came the closest.

Reviews.name: The Last of Us: Part 2
Reviews.title: The Last of This Story
Reviews.reason: A story that flew too close to the sun that it failed to see what it was doing wrong to begin with.

Reviews.name: Sonic The Hedgehog 2006
Reviews.title: Terrible Yet Hilarious
Reviews.reason: The glitches and bugs are so horrendous, it becomes a joy to play through, incredibly.

Reviews.name: Stardew Valley
Reviews.title: Incredible With Minor Tweaks
Reviews.reason: I like it, but it feels incomplete without mods. I can spend a whole day playing it though.

Reviews.name: Warframe
Reviews.title: The Best F2P There Ever Lived
Reviews.reason: I love this game with all my heart but WHY DO WE HAVE TO WAIT SO LONG FOR THINGS TO FINISH BUILDING??

Reviews.name: Sonic Boom
Reviews.title: Just Don't
Reviews.reason: Meh, it's neither hilariously bad, nor any good. Just meh.
